pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of Basketball Data // Collection of tools to work with basketball data. Functions available are related to friendly web scraping and visualization. Data were obtained from http://www.euroleague.net/, http://www.eurocupbasketball.com/ and http://www.acb.com, following the instructions of their respectives robots.txt files. Tools for visualization include a population pyramid, 2D plots of archetypoids and the rest of players, percentile circular plots, plots to analyze monthly evolution, heatmaps, shooting barplots, four factor plots and maps of players' nationalities.
